Title: Key Decisions
Plot: Gob decides to lock himself in his father's prison for 24 hours to get back in with the alliance, and to spend quality time with his father. Michael takes Gob's girlfriend to an awards show, and Buster inadvertently flirts with his mother's rival.
GuestStars: Leonor Varela, Clint Howard, David Reynolds, Stacey Grenrock-Woods, Rocky McMurray, Eduardo Palomo, Bruno Oliver, Lee Ryan
